reviewText: Great little movies my son loves them, must buy for any body who loves monster trucks  my son cant get enough
Bad quality video. My son loves monster trucks but this DVD can barely keep his interest.  I have Vol  1 and 2  and was not impressed w/ either.

content was good enough to keep my 3yrs busy for hours to bad dvd didn't last that long.  DVD ended up with some kind of discoloration and will no longer play....  like anything else you take a chance on what you buy......
We had just been to the Monster Truck rally with my grandson. This DVD was for him and he loves it.

the movie was ok, kinda stuck in the early 90's and their was really no words said just the trucks crushing things.. i think the announcer speaking more would of made it more exciting to watch.. i did entertain my boys for the trip but they didn't want to see it a second time.. and i know that others i bought they couldn't get enough of
This is a very entertaining DVD that features footage from the Toughest Monster Truck Tour, which I consider the best arena monster truck show out there.
It is a great DVD.  I took my son to see a Monster Truck show live and this DVD is a great capture of what we saw. I would recommend for all ages!  Loads of fun
Fun movie!
Very Pleased
My son loves monster trucks and this movie was jammed full with them! I'm very happy with this purchase!
Bought this for our four-year-old nephew who is into monster trucks. He watched it once and was entertained for the most part.
Excellent!

Doesn't even compare to "Lots and Lots of Firetrucks". My kids wore that DVD out so I thought they'd love this one. VERY different format, doesn't teach the kids anything at all about the sport. Very disappointing. Watch youtube instead.
He loves it.

We have Lots and Lots of Trains 1 and 2, so we were very excited about Lots and Lots of Monster Trucks! I have to admit that I'm a bit disappointed at the number of motorcross items on the DVD. I felt like it was a bit misleading. Overall, its a great movie!
A great video for young monster truck fans. From my 7 year old: monster trucks are awesome.
love them great series
Excellent product, fast shipping.
grandson loved it
Enjoyed by 3 year old Monster  truck fan.
Horrible graphics and videography. Waste of money.
My grandkids loves this. They have watched it many many times. They even got AmMa to watch it more than once.

My grandson recently attended a live monster truck performance.  This dvd has been the perfect follow up for expanding vocabulary and filling in some down-time on rainy days. I earned extra hugs with this purchase!

My four year old son really enjoys watching monster trucks and has practically worn out this movie already!  He even makes mom watch with him and it's fun to see the variety of monster trucks through the years.
just be prepared for trucks driving around, no breaks talking about the trucks.  boring for my son and not very interested in the movie.
It was okay. I thought it could have been better. It was for my great nephew, and he loves it!
I got this for my grandson ( 3 years old) who became scared by some of the fire breathing trucks and the loud engine sound.
My 3year old grandson likes it .
great movie
Keeps my grandson entertained
exactly and perfect
This is pretty low quality filming. If it's for a 1-2 year old they won't care, but having to watch it along with him is tough. Much better to watch an official Monster Jam video.

The first 15 minutes is all monster trucks, then it breaks down into a collection of RC toys, motocross, quads, rocket quads, kids carts, hydraulic monster, etc.  Less than 30 minutes is monster trucks.  Misleading.  Disappointing to a little boy who wanted to see monster trucks. "Lots and lots of monster trucks" should be titled "lots of stuff you will see at a monster truck rally".  Why don't you just sell what you advertise.
My son loves this. I find there to be a lot of advertising at the end if you hit "play all" option. Kind of annoying. But a kid who loves monster trucks will love this.
My son is 2 and was happy with it but i was dissapointed. The movie only shows video clips and half of it isn't about monster trucks (four wheels,dirtbikes and some dragon machine that eats cars)
Poor quality. It plays background music the entire time so you can bearly hear the actual sound of the trucks. Lots of slow motion too. My 3 year old was bord after 10 min. Very disappointing.
My grandson loved it
